sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; // 根据语言名称生成颜色 const getLanguageColor = (language) => { const colorMap = { JavaScript: '#f1e05a', TypeScript: '#2b7489', Python: '#3572A5', Java: '#b07219', Go: '#00ADD8', 'C++': '#f34b7d', Ruby: '#701516', PHP: '#4F5D95', Rust: '#dea584', 'C#': '#178600', Swift: '#ffac45', Kotlin: '#F18E33' }; return colorMap[language] || `hsl(${Math.abs(language.split('').reduce((acc, char) => acc + char.charCodeAt(0), 0)) % 360}, 70%, 60%)`; }; const mockData = { totalRepositories: 5427, totalStars: 3641982, totalContributors: 48273, languages: [ { name: 'JavaScript', percentage: 28.4 }, { name: 'Python', percentage: 22.1 }, { name: 'Java', percentage: 15.7 }, { name: 'TypeScript', percentage: 12.3 }, { name: 'Go', percentage: 8.9 }, { name: 'C++', percentage: 7.2 }, { name: 'Ruby', percentage: 5.4 } ], topRepositories: [ { name: 'react', stars: 182000, description: '用于构建用户界面的JavaScript库' }, { name: 'vue', stars: 153000, description: '渐进式JavaScript框架' }, { name: 'tensorflow', stars: 147000, description: '机器学习框架' } ] }; const Dashboard = () => { const [data] = useState(mockData); return (

数据概览

{data.totalRepositories.toLocaleString()}
仓库数量
{data.totalStars.toLocaleString()}
总星标数
{data.totalContributors.toLocaleString()}
贡献者数量

编程语言分布

{data.languages.map(lang => (
{lang.name} {lang.percentage}%
))}

热门仓库

    {data.topRepositories.map(repo => (

  • {repo.name}

    ⭐ {repo.stars.toLocaleString()}

    {repo.description}

    • ))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
